name: astro-firebase-starter
title: Astro Firebase Starter
desc: A minimal and accessible theme for getting started with Firebase, Tailwind, and Svelte.
article:
This theme helps you quickly get started on a new project that is accessible and looks nice. I designed this template to be like a blank canvas to help you start out building your apps.

Features

  • Responsive, mobile-friendly landing pages
  • Perfect Google Lighthouse Scores
  • Easy and secure sign-in/sign-up functionality with Firebase
  • An Accessible Popover Component that meets guidelines with W3C Aria guidelines
  • Sleek and minimalist forms inspired by modern design principles
